creator: Johnny Capps
Julian Jones
Jake Michie
plot outline: Young Merlin (Colin Morgan) is a teenager, discovering and then learning to master his magical gift. Magister Gaius (Richard Wilson), King Uther Pendragon's (Anthony Head's) learned court physician to whom he's assigned as humble page, teaches him medicine, coaches his magical self-study, and warns him of Uther's strong aversion to magic. Merlin becomes squire to the noble but imprudent crown Prince, Arthur (Bradley James), whose fate is linked with Merlin.
title: Merlin
akas: The Adventures of Merlin (Hong Kong, English title)
The Adventures of Merlin (Japan, English title)
The Adventures of Merlin (World-wide, English title)
plot: These are the brand new adventures of _Merlin_ (qv), the legendary sorcerer as a young man, when he was just a servant to young Prince Arthur on the royal court of Camelot, who has soon become his best friend, and turned Arthur into a great king and a legend.

Young _Merlin_ (qv) (Colin Morgan) is a teenager, discovering and then learning to master his magical gift. Magister Gaius (Richard Wilson), King Uther Pendragon's (Anthony Head's) learned court physician to whom he's assigned as humble page, teaches him medicine, coaches his magical self-study, and warns him of Uther's strong aversion to magic. _Merlin_ (qv) becomes squire to the noble but imprudent crown Prince, Arthur (Bradley James), whose fate is linked with _Merlin_ (qv).::KGF Vissers

This is a story of young _Merlin_ (qv) (Colin Morgan), a simple servant to young Prince Arthur (Bradley James) in royal court of Camelot.They soon became best friends, but _Merlin_ (qv) has a secret: he's a mighty sorcerer who has to hide his magical powers even from Arthur, so that he can stay alive.

A twist on the Arthurian legend which brings _Merlin_ (qv) (Colin Morgan) back as a young boy who acts as servant to Prince Arthur (Bradley James). The warlock must come to terms with his destiny to protect the Prince from harm, all the while being at risk of being exposed as a sorceror. Arthur and _Merlin_ (qv) experience many dangerous adventures, and with the help of close friends, fight off threats to the kingdom and build a brother-like bond.
